stringStorage.28d075e54f235ecd9400d345641679ba46d44720:
schema {
  query: Queries
}

directive @composeDirective(name: String!) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @eventsPublish(sourceID: String, topic: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @eventsRequest(sourceID: String, topic: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @eventsSubscribe(sourceID: String, topic: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @extends on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @external on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @inaccessible on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

directive @interfaceObject on OBJECT

directive @key(fields: openfed__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @link(as: String, for: String, import: [String], url: String!) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @override(from: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @provides(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @requires(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @shareable on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

type Consultancy @key(fields: "upc") {
  name: ProductName!
  upc: ID!
}

type Cosmo @key(fields: "upc") {
  name: ProductName!
  repositoryURL: String!
  upc: ID!
}

type Documentation {
  url(product: ProductName!): String!
  urls(products: [ProductName!]!): [String!]!
}

type Employee @key(fields: "id") {
  id: Int!
  notes: String! @override(from: "employees")
  products: [ProductName!]!
}

enum ProductName {
  CONSULTANCY
  COSMO
  ENGINE
  FINANCE
  HUMAN_RESOURCES
  MARKETING
  SDK
}

union Products = Consultancy | Cosmo | Documentation

type Queries {
  productTypes: [Products!]!
}

scalar openfed__FieldSet
